Item.name: Box of Milky Ice Cream Base
Item.description: The base for Milky Ice Cream. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.

Item.name: Box of Milky Ice Cream
Item.description: A box of Milky Ice Cream. People say they feel more resilient for a longer period of time after eating it. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.

Item.name: Ball of Milky Ice Cream
Item.description: A scoop of Milky Ice Cream. People say they feel more resilient for a longer period of time after eating it.

Item.name: Box of Pomegrenade Ice Cream Base
Item.description: The base for Pomegrenade Ice Cream. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.

Item.name: Box of Pomegrenade Ice Cream
Item.description: A box of Pomegrenade Ice Cream. A tasty snack that apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.

Item.name: Ball of Pomegrenade Ice Cream
Item.description: A scoop of Pomegrenade Ice Cream. A tasty snack that apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient.

Item.name: Box of Pop Nut Ice Cream Base
Item.description: The base for Pop Nut Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.

Item.name: Box of Pop Nut Ice Cream
Item.description: A box of Pop Nut Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.

Item.name: Ball of Pop Nut Ice Cream
Item.description: A scoop of Pop Nut Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain, makes more resilient and quenches thirst quite good.

Item.name: Box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream Base
Item.description: The base for Bubble Berry Ice Cream. A very refreshing taste similar to how strawberries tasted like back on earth. Store it in a refrigerated container to make edible ice cream.

Item.name: Box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream
Item.description: A box of Bubble Berry Ice Cream. A very refreshing taste similar to how strawberries tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain and makes more resilient. A full box can yield up to 16 scoops of ice cream.

Item.name: Ball of Bubble Berry Ice Cream
Item.description: A scoop of Bubble Berry Ice Cream. Tastes kind of similar to what chocolate tasted like back on earth. Apparently reduces a bit of pain, makes more resilient and quenches thirst a little bit.

Item.name: Moloch Cheese
Item.description: Cheese made from moloch milk. Can be cut into 18 cheese slices.

Item.name: MolocheFort
Item.description: Cheese made from moloch milk. Can be cut into 18 cheese slices.

Item.name: Waffle Cone
Item.description: A cone shaped waffle for ice cream. Contained ice cream will melt if not contained within a refrigerated container.
